GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 19 February 2025
Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Galle, Matara, Kaluthara and Rathnapura districts
in the evening or night. Mainly dry weather will prevail elsewhere over the island.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, Uva, North-western
and North-central provinces during the morning.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary
localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
